name: LiteVenture
description:
This game's purpose was to create a quest system, which could interact with the player and items, to use in future projects.

Liteventure is a complete game in that there is a complete gameplay loop in which the player can continue playing as long as they would like, assuming they aren't brought below 0 hp. However, there's a very limited amount of content and no actual end goal (win condition) for the player. Again this is a technical project, rather than a functional one.
